Grouped_Utterances: They were really positive. It felt good to reconnect and share what I’ve been going through. It felt freeing, actually. I didn’t realize how much I needed that. It was really emotional but in a good way. I felt like she was there with us. I’ve had a couple of moments, but I’ve been able to catch myself before it escalates. A few. There was a project deadline that had everyone stressed, but I managed to stay calm. It felt empowering. I was proud of myself for not losing my cool.
Hi, Ellie! I’ve been doing pretty well. I reached out to a couple of friends. Yes! I made one for a small gathering with friends, and they loved it. It brought back some great memories.
Yes, I’ve made it a habit. It really helps in those tense moments.
I’ve been thinking about writing down some of my favorite memories and recipes.  I want to keep reaching out to friends and maybe start that memory book for my mom.
